messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Weather, was Apologies from Dawn F
messages.msgSnippet: ... it was cooler than typical in NW OH as well, until last week when it was pretty unbearable.  Now, today it is positively nippy. dawn h-s
messages.messageBody:
>
> Come to think of it, we've had a cooler than average summer here in SW Ohio
> also. Not as cool as yours, apparently, Lynda, but I think we have had very
> few days in the 90's, which is unusual. I was so busy enjoying not roasting
> slowly that I missed the reasons why!! (Duh!)

it was cooler than typical in NW OH as well, until last week when it was
pretty unbearable. Now, today it is positively nippy.

dawn h-s

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Weather, was Apologies from Dawn F
messages.msgSnippet: ... Shirley says: Come to think of it, we ve had a cooler than average summer here in SW Ohio also. Not as cool as yours, apparently, Lynda, but I think we
messages.messageBody:
Lynda said:
> Hey, how's about we trade some weather. We never did have a real summer.
> I'll send you some 67 degree days for some 100 degree days down on the
> river.
>

Shirley says:

Come to think of it, we've had a cooler than average summer here in SW Ohio
also. Not as cool as yours, apparently, Lynda, but I think we have had very
few days in the 90's, which is unusual. I was so busy enjoying not roasting
slowly that I missed the reasons why!! (Duh!)

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Weather, was Apologies from Dawn F
messages.msgSnippet: Hey, how s about we trade some weather.  We never did have a real summer. I ll send you some 67 degree days for some 100 degree days down on the river. Lynda
messages.messageBody:
Hey, how's about we trade some weather. We never did have a real summer.
I'll send you some 67 degree days for some 100 degree days down on the
river.

Lynda

LOTS

cats

>
> >

need

like)...

> > Dawn F
